duties_responsibilities.duty: Enroll existing clients in Horace Mann benefits during open enrollment period.
Present employee benefit offerings and educate employees on the available benefits.
Conduct enrollments for multiple accounts during open enrollment periods.
Utilize active listening and strong communication skills to provide superior service to clients.
Use problem-solving skills to address client inquiries and concerns effectively.
Maintain a high level of customer service and satisfaction throughout the enrollment process.
Ensure accuracy and completeness of all required enrollment documentation.
